Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory580.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Walking in a well-lit corridor, Haicma contemplates what "Mother" said.'}
{3: '—These awakened machines have more or less been enlightened by Sage.'}
{3: 'As how she was first guided by Nanami, she is now guiding other mechanoids.'}
{3: 'Afterward, the awakened machines received a message from an unknown entity, and they proceeded to build this massive starship.'}
{3: '—They must be very certain that the message they heard is true.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Why was that? Was it because of what the message said? Or the identity of the entity who sent it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'But one thing Haicma is sure.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: '"Sagemachina will return to the Church, guiding us away from this broken earth to the end of stars."', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory580.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: '...To the end of stars...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2701_04.jpg'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'How about Nanami calls you "Haicma" from now on?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Because Nanami wants to make lots and lots of friends!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory580.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Is that really what Nanami wants? To set out on a lonely journey with the awakened machines?'}
{3: 'Silent, she closes her eyes.'}
{3: 'Haicma has brushed past Nanami several times on her journey.'}
{3: 'But Haicma could never bring herself to greet Nanami when she found Nanami smiling, surrounded by friends.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory216.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "You're the best! Don't forget about Nanami! Nanami won't forget anyone of you!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the joyous figure left with her friends, the forgotten shadow in the corner could only watch.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: "...I'll see you next time.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory580.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'That was enough. Her job was to observe.'}
{3: 'Even with the data anomaly in her mind, hoping that Nanami would remain happy was all she could ask.'}
{3: 'But what about now?'}
{3: 'What will happen if the Church of Machina finds her?'}
{3: 'And if they cannot, what will become of the awakened machines?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chariot', 3: 'Haicma, it is time you give us an answer.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: "No. There is much I still don't understand.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'What exactly is the Church of Machina?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chariot', 3: '"Mother" has answered you already.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'She told me how it was formed, but she never explained why it is a "church."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chariot', 3: 'Faith begets strength. We formed a church because we wanted to gather the power of faith, obviously.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Machines don't need faith.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chariot', 3: 'What? You are such a basic mechanoid that you do not even comprehend faith!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Please provide more information.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chariot', 3: "Aren't there already more than enough examples of religious sacrifice and miracles in history?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'But those belonged to humans.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chariot', 3: 'We have long surpassed humanity! We can recreate what they achieved!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The hunky mechanoid before her does not understand how humankind defined faith, but it is obsessed with the special phenomenon caused by it.'}
{3: 'Created from an assembly of calculations and algorithms, are machines doomed by these rudimentary data?'}
{2: 'Chariot', 3: 'If you continue to question our faith in Sagemachina...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Mimicking "anger," Chariot prepares to fight.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Stop, Chariot.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'You will not perform such barbaric acts on our future family.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chariot', 3: 'She has not joined.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Why are you hesitating?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "...Is it really Sage's choice to abandon Earth and everything she loves here to travel to the end of the stars?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: "I don't know.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'But we can ask her on the day we find her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "If she doesn't agree to this, will you let her go?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'If that is the ending she chooses, why will her "disciples" defy her?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'This is why the mechanoids formed a "church."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: "We're doing all of this for the day Sage returns voluntarily.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: "Haha... Even when some children are impatient, I'm sure we can't make her stay if she doesn't want to, given what Sage is capable of.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'So? Can you decide now?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Even if Haicma rejected Mother's invitation, she would only continue her wandering journey."}
{3: 'As an observer, she must continue observing this peculiar group. More importantly, Mother has agreed not to harm Nanami.'}
{3: 'Because of these two duties that she has yet to forget, Haicma nods at Arcana.'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: "Is that a yes? I'm pleased to see that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: "Let's go. Allow me to give you a tour of our starship and introduce our members to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Mother.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{3: "Arcana turns around, her face colliding with Haicma's extended hand."}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Your halo is crooked.', 4: '2'}
